Morgan and boasts a substantial amount of assets under management, which suggests legitimacy. There are no unusually low prices or free claims, no unrealistic money-making promises, and no targeting of psychological weaknesses evident in the text. The website seems to focus on a specific area of business (investment accounting & reporting) rather than handling a variety of unrelated products. The contact details and privacy policy appear to be in line with what would be expected from a legitimate business.
